title: Club Tag Won't Show in Game
body:
Hi,
The club that I am a part of contains more than 5 members, and I have pressed "show club tag".
However, once I join a game, the club tag does not show, nor ones that other people have.
Thanks!

replies.body:
This could be a config issue not toggling your tag view correctly.  Let me know if a config reset fixes this up for you:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Yeah... A lot of people has this problem the club tag won't show next to the name bar in game above your character....
I know a lot of people who is wondering why it doesn't show anymore (since pre season first week of November)

Kinda sucks... I don't know if it's a bug or you guys don't want club tags to appear next to names above the health bar anymore.

Hi,
I tried a config reset but the bug still persisted.
Any thoughts?
Thanks!
